title: A Difficult Few Months (with Alexander Stafford MP)
itunes:title: A Difficult Few Months (with Alexander Stafford MP)
description:
Alexander Stafford, Conservative MP for Rother Valley, says the lights will "happily stay on" despite an energy supply crunch. But he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts we're set for a "difficult few months."

Bloomberg U.K. government reporter Joe Mayes analyses Boris Johnson's cabinet reshuffle and Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Therese Raphael says the prime minister has not been afraid to wield the axe.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
